title: The problem with honor
body: One month ago they took my ban for 14 days, and now in a month they do not give me any honor or reward.

replies.body: When your honor gets locked from punishments or you drop to rank 1 or 0, you need to show consistent reform from the behavior that warranted the punishment before they'll be lifted. It looks like certain chat logs were showing the same behavior, but instead of punishing you again the system chose to keep your honor progress slowed. Focus on staying honorable and you'll start rising through the honor ranks again.
